木の暗: (このくれ) - shade under a tree in full leaf; summer
木の暗れ: (このくれ) - shade under a tree in full leaf; summer
木の暮れ: (このくれ) - shade under a tree in full leaf; summer
木の末: (このうれ) - treetop; tip of a branch
木の芽: (kinome) - leaf bud; bud of Japanese pepper tree (Xantoxilum piperitum)
木の芽漬: (このめづけ) - pickled buds of chocolate vine, Japanese pepper tree, etc.
木の芽漬け: (このめづけ) - pickled buds of chocolate vine, Japanese pepper tree, etc.
木の葉採り月: (このはとりづき) - fourth lunar month
木の葉採月: (このはとりづき) - fourth lunar month
木の葉木菟: (コノハヅク) - Eurasian scops owl (Otus scops)
木の葉虫: (コノハムシ) - leaf insect (esp. species Phyllium pulchrifolium)
木の虚ろ: (きのうつろ) - hollow in a tree
木を伐る: (きをきる) - to fell a tree
木を見て森を見ず: (きをみてもりをみず) - (proverb) to not see the wood for the trees; to be caught up with trivial matters and lose sight of the big picture
木五倍子: (キブシ) - early spiketail (species of flowering plant, Stachyurus praecox)
木仏金仏石仏: (きぶつかなぶついしぼとけ) - inflexible people; heartless people; Buddhist images of wood, metal, and stone
木付子: (キブシ) - early spiketail (species of flowering plant, Stachyurus praecox)
木像: (もくぞう) - wooden statue or image
木切れ: (きぎれ) - a piece of wood (cut from a larger piece)
木口: (きぐち) - grade of wood/quality of wood; cut end (of a piece of wood)
木天蓼: (マタタビ) - silver vine (Actinidia polygama); cat powder
木守: (こもり) - person who tends to trees (e.g. in a garden)
木守り: (きまぶり) - fruits left on a tree during winter (supposedly causing more fruits to appear in the next season)
木尻: (こじり) - (鐺, 璫, 小尻 only) (ornamental) tip of a scabbard; (鐺, 璫, 木尻 only) bottom of a bargeboard or cantilever
木屑: (きくず) - wood chips; wood offcuts; wood shavings; sawdust
木履: (ぽくり) - (usu. ぽっくり, ぼっくり) girl's lacquered wooden geta; (usu. ぼくり, ぽくり) wooden footwear/clogs/sabots
木工所: (もっこうしょ) - carpentry shop; woodworking plant; sawmill
木工機械: (もっこうきかい) - woodworking tools; woodworking machines
木戸: (きど) - wicket gate/wooden door; entrance to an entertainment venue (i.e. sumo arena, etc.)
木戸御免: (きどごめん) - (yoji) have a pass to; have access to
木戸銭: (きどせん) - gate money; admission fee
木所: (きどころ) - classification of fragrant woods used as incense
木暗がり: (こくらがり) - darkness under the trees; dark place under the trees
木曽馬: (きそうま) - var. of horse raised in Nagano and Gifu
木曾川: (きそがわ) - river in Gifu Prefecture
木木: (きぎ) - every tree; many trees; all kinds of trees
木本植物: (もくほんしょくぶつ) - woody plant
木村蜘蛛: (キムラグモ) - Heptathela kimurai (species of burrowing spider)
